Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates the extent to which the campaign has been denied access to observe counting in Detroit.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks sufficient evidence to support the assertion that the campaign has been denied access to observe counting in Detroit.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the denial of access to observe counting in Detroit is evidence of illegal votes or election malfeasance.
Exist alternative explanation: The claim fails to consider alternative explanations for the restrictions on observation, such as COVID-19 protocols and privacy concerns.
